autumn.util.data.json

Class JsonTypeSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • autumn.util.data.json.JsonTypeSystem

  • public final class JsonTypeSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    An instance of this interface can be used to impose a mandatory structure on JSON data.

    Predefined Types:

    • boolean
    • char
    • byte
    • short
    • int
    • long
    • float
    • double
    • BigInteger
    • BigInteger
    • String

        public JsonTypeSystem list(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String element)
        This method creates a new list-type.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the new type.
        element - is the type of elements that the list can contain.
        Returns:
        the modified copy of this object.

        This method creates a new map-type.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the new type.
        key - is the type of keys that the list can contain.

      • record

        public JsonTypeSystem record(java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> supers)
        This method creates a new record-type that inherits from other types.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the new type.
        supers - are the names of the parent record-types.
        Returns:
        the modified copy of this object.

      • element

        public JsonTypeSystem element(java.lang.String owner,
                     java.lang.String field,
                     java.lang.String type)
        This method adds a field to an record-type.
        Parameters:
        owner - is the name of the record-type.
        field - is the name of the new field.
        type - is the type of value that the field can contain.
        Returns:
        the modified copy of this object.

      • validate

        public boolean validate(boolean raise)
        This method verifies that all this object represents a well-defined type-system.
        Parameters:
        raise - indicates whether to throw an exception, iff the type-system contains an error.
        Returns:
        true, iff the type-system is error-free.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if raise is true and an error is detected.
